Package ass

Class Calculator

java.lang.Object
ass.Calculator
public class Calculator extends Object

calculator

the calulator program implements an application that simply displays "simple interst, compound interest,average " of given inputs from the uesrs

  • Method Details

    • simpleinterest

      public double simpleinterest(double p, double t, double r)
      This method is used calculate the simple interest of given inputs. this is a the simplest form of class method to calculate simple interest
      Parameters:
      si - this is the simple interests result it will store result data
      p - this is the initial principal balance
      r - this the annual interest rate
      t - this is the time in years
      Returns:
      si this returns result of calculation of simple interest

    • compoundinterest

      public double compoundinterest(double p, double r, double t)
      This method is used calculate the compound interest of given inputs.
      Parameters:
      ci - this is the compound interest result it will store result data
      p - this is the initial principal balance
      r - this the annual interest rate
      t - this is the time in years
      Returns:
      ci this returns result of calculation of compound interest

    • avgfive

      public int avgfive(int num1, int num2, int num3, int num4, int num5)
      This method is used to calculate the average of five
      Parameters:
      num1 - this is the first number
      num2 - this is the second number
      num3 - this is the third number
      num4 - this is the fourth number
      num5 - this is the fifth number
      Returns:
      average
